availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Boone County, Kentucky. Ran as the Know-Nothing candidate for Clay County Clerk successfully in 1858. Worked as the Clerk of Clay County through the Civil War.

Spouse: Eliza A Price
Children: Anne Price, Theophilus G Price, Gabriel Price

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Clay County, page 6.
The Louisville Daily Courier, "Clay County," August 12, 1858, page 2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, page 62.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, "Gabriel Winter Price," https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=26797412&ref=acom accessed 05/12/2017.
